title: Ambient Video Game Music - Rainforests 2
description: Deepen your journey into the thriving wilderness with this sequel to our popular collection of 10 ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Deepen your journey into the thriving wilderness with this sequel to our popular collection of 10 ambience tracks, each reflecting the ever-present vibrancy and mystique of rainforests. Tailored for game developers, these tracks further intensify the experience of the jungle's rhythm, offering players a more immersive adventure amidst the verdant undergrowth and towering canopies.


Each track in this sequel amplifies the rich sonic experience of rainforests. The sound of the heavy rain is more pronounced, its resonant patter echoing through the trees, immersing players in the midst of a tropical storm. The calls of diverse bird species are richer and more varied, their melodic songs interweaving with the rain's rhythmic symphony, breathing life into the virtual environment.


Additional rainforest sounds, more nuanced than before, are carefully blended into the tracks. The rustling of countless leaves in the gentle wind, the low creaks of ancient trees swaying, and the subtle, distant calls of unseen wildlife all serve to deepen the sensory immersion, intensifying the feeling of exploring a living, breathing rainforest.


This sequel is an invaluable addition to any game developer's arsenal seeking to create even more detailed and immersive rainforest environments. The intensified sounds of pouring rain, the enriched variety of bird calls, and the resonant soundtrack promise to draw players deeper into the heart of the rainforest. With these tracks, every game becomes a journey of discovery, each moment brimming with the sights and sounds of the untamed wild.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
